en.title: Collage - AI-Powered Photo Collage
en.description: Collage creates your brand new AI-powered look in one click. Transform your photos with AI-powered collage effects and filters. Available on Telegram.

ru.description: Collage создаст ваш новый AI-стиль одним тапом. Преобразуйте свои фотографии с помощью AI-эффектов и фильтров. Доступно в Telegram.

en.title: Privacy Policy - Collage
en.description: Privacy Policy for Collage - AI-powered photo collage application. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
